categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The Worthless Fool was a VR-10 Cuirilla-Rayl Xylines-class spacetug belonging to the Alliance to Restore the Republic. It was captained by Maytoc Kollene.
Its crew traveled to Najarka, the Laim system, and Narg to rescue artist Crying Dawn Singer from the clutches of the Galactic Empire. This earned them the respect of the Shashay species.
